articles.title: 2021 Mnet Asian Music Awards announce lineup – TXT, aespa, Stray Kids, - Bandwagon

The Mnet Asian Music Awards just dropped their lineup for this year.
The likes of TXT, aespa, Stray Kids, ITZY, NCT 127, ATEEZ, NCT DREAM, ENHYPEN...
articles.content:
The Mnet Asian Music Awards just dropped their lineup for this year.
